IgnoreAttribute Class

Summary

This attribute will prevent a test from being run.   It will still show up in the lists of tests, and reported as an Ignored test

Namespace: DUnitX.TestFramework
Inheritance Hierarchy
TCustomAttribute
  DUnitX.TestFramework.IgnoreAttribute
Syntax
Delphi
type
 IgnoreAttribute = class(TCustomAttribute)
 end;

Reason

Represents property Reason.

Top
Remarks

This is useful when you need to temporarily stop a test from running.
